scripts.build: npm run predeploy:function && npm run predeploy:hosting
scripts.predeploy:function: npm run clear:function && npm run lint:functions && npm run build:src && npm run build:function
scripts.build:function: cp -r src/.nuxt functions/. && npm --prefix functions run build
scripts.build:src: npm run clear:src && npm --prefix src run build
scripts.predeploy:hosting: npm run clear:hosting && mkdir -p public/assets && cp -r functions/.nuxt/dist/* public/assets/. && cp -a src/static/. public/
